SELECT RESNO,MEMBERNO,MOVIENO,MOVIETITLE,MOVIEETITLE,MOVIETYPE,MOVIEGRADE,RESCINEMA,RESDATE,RESTHEATER,RESPERSON,RESTOTAL, RESSEATNO,MEMBERID,MEMBERNAME,MEMBERNICKNAME FROM (SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(MANAGER_RESERVATION MANAGER_RESERVATION_PK)*/ ROWNUM RN, mr.RESNO, mr.MEMBERNO, mr.MOVIENO, mr.MOVIETITLE, mr.MOVIEETITLE, mr.MOVIETYPE, mr.MOVIEGRADE, mr.RESCINEMA, mr.RESDATE, mr.RESTHEATER, mr.RESPERSON, mr.RESTOTAL, mr.RESSEATNO, mm.MEMBERID, mm.MEMBERNAME, mm.MEMBERNICKNAME FROM MANAGER_RESERVATION mr, MANAGER_MEMBER mm WHERE
mr.MEMBERNO IN (SELECT MEMBERNO FROM MANAGER_MEMBER WHERE MEMBERID=#{keyword} AND MR.MEMBERNO=MM.MEMBERNO)
mr.MEMBERNO IN (SELECT MEMBERNO FROM MANAGER_MEMBER WHERE MEMBERNAME=#{keyword} AND MR.MEMBERNO=MM.MEMBERNO)
ROWNUM <= (#{pageNum}*#{amount}) AND mm.MEMBERNO = mr.MEMBERNO) WHERE RN > (#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MANAGER_RESERVATION WHERE RESNO>0

SELECT RESNO,mr.MEMBERNO,mr.MOVIENO,mr.MOVIETITLE,mr.MOVIEETITLE,mr.MOVIETYPE,mr.MOVIEGRADE,mr.RESCINEMA, mr.RESDATE,mr.RESTHEATER,mr.RESPERSON,mr.RESTOTAL,mr.RESSEATNO,mm.MEMBERID,mm.MEMBERNAME,mm.MEMBERNICKNAME FROM MANAGER_MEMBER mm , MANAGER_RESERVATION mr WHERE RESNO=#{resNo} AND mr.MEMBERNO = mm.MEMBERNO
mapper.update: UPDATE MANAGER_RESERVATION SET MOVIENO=#{movieNo}, RESTHEATER=#{resTheater}, RESCINEMA=#{resCinema}, RESDATE=#{resDate}, RESPERSON=#{resPerson}, RESSEATNO=#{resSeatNo}, RESTOTAL=#{resTotal} WHERE MEMBERNO=#{memberNo}
